radirius.merc.environment

Interface Entity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Renderable, Updatable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckBox, Component, ImageButton, NewLine, Panel, Particle, ParticleSystem, RadioCheckBox, TextBar, TextBox, TextButton, TextField, Window

    public interface Entity
extends Updatable, Renderable
    An abstraction of objects that can be updated and rendered.

    wessles
